Documentation Updates

Below are documentation updates for January-March 2024.

Index of all documentation updates

22-March-2024

Major updates

  • Title: Video Processing Settings
  • Description: New video_format_conversion and video_color_format encoding settings added
  • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/encoding-settings/general-audio-video/encoding-settings-video-processing.html#video_format_conversion

  • Description: Encoding settings updated
  • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/encoding-settings/formats-codecs/encoding-settings-hdr10.html#video_color_format

  • Title: Supported HDR Video Formats
  • Description: Encoding settings updated
  • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/encoding-guides/hdr10-video-output.html
  • Category:

  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/hls-plugin.html
  • Category:

  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/picture-picture-plugin-aka-floating-or-pinned.html
  • Category:

  • Description: Added tip note about process for setting the language in localization
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/coding-topics/programmatically-localizing-brightcove-player.html
